title: Custom Design
description: Tracking receivers, interference detectors, con-scans -- tell us what you need.

title: Premade Designs
description: Maybe we've already made something to your liking. Reach out and we'll send you the specs.

title: Modern Software
description: Effortlessly leverage languages such as Python, Julia, and C++ to power your hardware.

title: Manufacturing
description: Don't just want the design -- want to see it shipped to you with a bow on top? We've got you covered.

title: Testing
description: The path from design to reality is a painful one, but we'll be with you every step of the way.

title: All-American
description: We proudly make all of our products here in the USA.
